stories.text: Being a student, collecting information is a huge for academic and exams. I bought an ipad for longevity of digital notes. Handwritten notes are easy but I cannot find good software or proper method of collecting the required information. Can anyone share any idea for maintaining a database for all my notes. The stream is Engineering.
stories.title: How to create a database of academic knowledge for the purpose of competition?
Researchers Can Steal Data During Homomorphic Encryption
Average Wages Rose by One Penny in January, Falling Behind Inflation
Surgeon general demands data on Covid-19 misinformation from major tech firms

stories.text:
I noticed that, after choosing the endpoints of a trip, if I try to choose an arrival time in Firefox, the page blanks out except for a loading animation in the center.

If I do the same in Chrome, it looks like it's working.

Can you reproduce this? Is it an example of Google's anti-competitive practices, since they own the browser and Waze as well?
stories.title: Ask HN: Does Waze “Arrive at” work for you in Firefox?
